function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of tourism and trade connecting countries","Impact":"Increased risk of imported cases and rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict travel measures, including quarantine and testing","Technologies":"Travel restrictions, testing, and contact tracing technology","People":"Travelers, local residents, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Government authorities and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Large metropolitan areas experiencing significant spread of infectious diseases","Impact":"Rapid and widespread transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enhanced public health surveillance, rapid response protocols, and targeted vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Public health surveillance systems, outbreak prediction models, and vaccination technology","People":"Urban residents, healthcare workers, and community leaders","Owner":"Public health agencies and local government authorities"},{"Description":"Heterogeneous human settlement characteristics impacting epidemic spread","Impact":"Variable and unpredictable patterns of disease transmission and impact","Mitigation":"Customized public health interventions, community engagement, and data-driven response strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, geo-mapping tools, and community health monitoring technology","People":"Diverse population groups in different settlements","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations, and research institutions"}]}
